author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Virtra Q1 Loss Per Share $0.01
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - VirTra Inc:
* Q1 REVENUE FELL 22.9 PERCENT TO $3.2 MILLION * AS OF MARCH 31, 2018, COMPANY S BACKLOG WAS APPROXIMATELY $8.3 MILLION Source bit.ly/2wFZUY9 Further company coverage:
